creator: Sttot
title: Gk0Wk/echarts-liquidfill
cpl.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/echarts-liquidfill
cpl.author: Gk0Wk
cpl.name: ECharts Liquid Fill Chart
cpl.description: Liquid Fill Chart plugin for Apache ECharts, which is usually used to represent data in percentage.
cpl.readme:
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang">
<$list filter="[<lang>search[zh]]">

[[liquid-fill chart|https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-liquidfill]] 是一个适合展示单一百分比数据的图表，支持多种水波和动画。

* 文档: https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-liquidfill
* 示例: https://www.makeapie.com/explore.html#tags=liquidFill~sort=rank~timeframe=all~author=all

</$list>

<$list filter="[<lang>!search[zh]]">

The [[liquid-fill chart|https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-liquidfill]] is a chart suitable for presenting a single percentage of data, supporting multiple water waves and animations.

* Doc: https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-liquidfill
* Examples: https://www.makeapie.com/explore.html#tags=liquidFill~sort=rank~timeframe=all~author=all

</$list>
</$list>
